attributes.action: Have a referendum on whether the House of Lords is elected or unelected chamber.
attributes.additional_details: The recent views they have aired about Brexit shows they may be discriminating against the will of the people who were given a referendum to ask for their views on whether they wanted to stay in Europe.
attributes.background: We are discriminating against the common people by not allowing the House of Lords to be an elected chamber. People should have the right to elect these personnel from all around the United Kingdom. This would take away the ability for discrimination against the people of the United Kingdom.
